isis.stitle: 8 SPEED, 9 SPEED, AND 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES - REMOVE - AUXILIARY SECTION

step1.para: Remove the retaining bolts in the auxiliary housing flange ( Figure 38).

figure.caption: Figure 38. Remove Retaining Bolts in Auxiliary Housing Flange

step1.para: Insert three bolts in the tapped holes of the housing flange ( Figure 39). Tighten evenly to move auxiliary section to the rear and just far enough from the front section to break the gasket seal.

figure.caption: Figure 39. Insert Bolts in Housing Flange

step1.para: Remove the bolts and attach a chain hoist to the auxiliary section. Move the assembly to the rear until free of the front section and remove the gasket ( Figure 40).

figure.caption: Figure 40. Attach Chain Hoist to Auxiliary Section and Move Section to Rear

step1.para: The auxiliary section can also be removed with the transmission set in the vertical position ( Figure 41). Block under the clutch housing to prevent damage to the input shaft. Remove the retaining bolts from the housing flange. Lift the assembly from the front section. Remove the gasket.

figure.caption: Figure 41. Auxiliary Section Can Be Removed With Transmission Set in Vertical Position
